Paragraph: In these optimized conditions , two typical devices using PC71BM and PC61BM as acceptor exhibited the following typical J-V characteristics in Figure 2 under 1000 W m -2 air mass 1.5 global ( AM 1.5G ) illumination.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In these optimized conditions , two typical devices using PC71BM and PC61BM as acceptor exhibited the following typical J-V characteristics in Figure 2 under 1000 W m -2 air mass 1.5 global ( AM 1.5G ) illumination.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |
| J-V characteristics |
| 1000 W m-2 air mass 1.5 global (AM 1.5G) illumination |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "1000 W m-2 air mass 1.5 global (AM 1.5G) illumination" (this is a measure of light intensity, not a material property)
* "J-V characteristics" (this refers to the electrical properties of a material, but is not a specific material property)
